item.title: HELP!need help plz reply with a good and step by step tutorial on how to make
item.dc:creator: @dawn_killer dawn killer
item.description:
@dawn_killer wrote:

Melissa T
Senior Member

Rep: 133
Offline

[LOOK] Lot Of guide's like : Moparscape guide / Hamachi / no-ip ect !

« on: February 04, 2007, 05:02:44 PM »

THE GUIDE HAS BEEN UPDATED FOR 3.1! THE PICS ARE THE SAME BECAUSE THE STEPS ARE THE SAME, BUT I CHANGED THE LINK!

Ok, because I have seen loads of questions about the same things, I decided to make an up-to-date guide to MoparScape.
NOTE - This Guide (Currently ) Does Not Cover Private Server Creation!

Step 1. Go to “C:/Program Files/Java” and see if you have a folder named “jre1.5.0_8”.

IF YOU DO, THEN SKIP TO STEP 5, OTHERWISE CONTINUE BELOW

Step 2. Download the latest JRE from this link: https://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp

IF YOU ARE INTERESTED IN DEVELOPING YOUR OWN SERVER, THEN DOWNLOAD THE LATEST J2SE DEVELOPMENT KIT (JDK)

Step 3. Once the download you selected is done, follow the very simple instructions to install. The installation may take several minutes.

Step 4. Restart your computer if prompted.

Step 5. Download the MoparScape Private Server Client from this link: http://rapidshare.de/files/35958442/MoparScape31.rar (Scroll Down, Then Click “Free”)

Step 6. If you do not already have it, download and install WinRAR from the official RARLabs link: http://rarlabs.com/rar/wrar36b8.exe

Step 7. Right-Click MoparScape30.zip (or the current version at the time you read this), and click “Extract Files…”.

Step 8. Specify where you want the folder to be located, then click “OK”.

Step 9. Find the folder that MoparScape was extracted to, and open it.

Step 10. Double-Click on “runMoparScape”.

Step 11. Wait until the cache is automatically downloaded.

Step 12. If you would like to play on your own basic HybridScape, click “Start Server”.

NOTE - If you choose to start the HybridScape Server, you will be playing by yourself on an empty version of RuneScape. Your Friends CAN NOT connect to this.

Step 13. Find a server that you would like to connect to that is online, by using a Status Checker, such as RS-Server’s, located here: RS-Server Status Checker NOTE - This Screenie Is OUT OF DATE, do not go by it!

Step 14. In the MoparScape window, click “File” at the top-left.

Step 15. Click “New Server”.

Step 16. In the window that pops up, enter the IP of the server you would like to connect to, and click “OK”.

Step 17. Make up a Username and Password, then log in!

~Hamachi~

Hamachi is a program that allows you to connect to some servers that you would not be able to otherwise.

If you would like to connect to a server that requires Hamachi, download the Hamachi Client from the Official link: Hamachi

Hamachi has a built in Step-By-Step Tutorial that will explain EVERYTHING you need to do to connect to the Server.

~Trouble-Shooting~

Q: My automatic Cache download isn’t working/is having errors, how can I fix it?
A: Manually download the Cache from ~HERE~, then extract it into the “C:\WINDOWS.mpr_file_store_32” folder.

Q: When I try to play, it only gets through X Mb, then stops/I am having the “Error Connecting - Retrying in 60” error, how do I fix it?
A: Same as above, this error normally occurs when you have a bad internet connection, or dial-up. Try closing all programs that use the internet, to get the maximum power out of your connection, then try again.

If you like it, you know how to say thanks

Thanks

100% Credits by ~Sepranem~

Posted on: February 04, 2007, 05:01:06 PM

Difficulty: 1/10
Assumed Knowledge:Need to know how to download And read -.-

First Download hamachi :

http://www.hamachi.cc/download/

If u downloaded it then u need to do this :

Open hamachi

if u see this :

click on it then u will see this :

click on Join

Then u will see this :

then enter the network name and pass

up the network name
under the network pass

This is the example of a server :

Now enter the network name and pass and then join =]

If u want to join a no-ip server then u just need to do this :

Enter the no-ip server on the i-p adress

And then u are done =]

How To make a hamachi server :

Purpose: Making hamachi server , if u dont have a router

Difficulty: 3/10

Assumed Knowledge: To read and c+p ( copy and paste )

Server Base: /

Classes Modified: Compile.bat runserver.bat

Procedure

Step 1

download hamachi [ http://www.hamachi.cc/download/ ]
Leave hamachi alone now

Step 2

U need to download JDK :

[ http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index_jdk5.jsp ]

Scroll down till u find : JDK Update 5.0 Update 10

Code:
JDK 5.0 Update 10
The Java SE Development Kit (JDK) includes:
the Java Runtime Environment (JRE)
command-line development tools, such as compilers and debuggers, that are necessary or useful for developing applets and applications
Download it .

Step 3 :

Now u need an source :

Project 16 ( If u are good coder then use this one )
CheezScape ( If u are meduim coder Then use this )
Testscape ( if u are starter )

Step 4 :

U need winrar now :
http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm
Download winrar now

Step 5 :

Now we need to compile.bat and runserver.bat

1.Go to ure source
2.Then u need to search for :

U will need : Textpad

Then Right mouse button Then Click Textpad.
Then replace evrything what there is whit this :

100 % Credits To Mod Taharok For Compiler :

Code:
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
:: ::
:: All of the following code is © Copywrited 2006-2007, ::
:: Grene Penguin Entertainment. ::
:: ::
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

@echo off
cls
:menu
title Runserver + Compiler version 1.4
echo Please choose an option below to do that function.
echo Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for
echo any updates that I post.
echo.
echo c - Compile your server.
echo r - To run your server.
echo e - To exit out of the program.
echo.
echo.
set /p compile=Option:
if %compile%==c goto compile
if %compile%==C goto compile
if %compile%==r goto run
if %compile%==R goto run
if %compile%==e goto end
if %compile%==E goto end
if %compile%==* goto error
goto error
:compile
cls
title Compiler
goto checkjavac
:compile2
if exist src (goto compile5) else (goto compile3)
:compile3
if exist *.java (goto compile4) else (goto compileerror)
:compile4
%javac% -cp . *.java
pause
cls
goto menu
:compile5
%javac% -cp . .\src*.java
pause
move .\src*.class .\classes
cls
goto menu
:compileerror
cls
echo You need to have Java files for this compiler to compile.
pause
cls
goto menu
:run
cls
title Runserver
goto checkjava
:run2
set runjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
cls
goto run3
:run3
if exist .\classes\server.class (goto run6) else (goto run4)
:run4
if exist .\server.class (goto run5) else (goto servererror)
:run5
%runjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:run6
set runjava=
set runjava=%java% -cp .;./classes; Server
%runjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:servererror
cls
title Error
echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the
echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try running it.
pause
cls
goto menu
:error
cls
title Error
echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type
echo in are correct.
pause
cls
goto menu
:end
cls
exit
:checkjavac
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac) else (goto checkjavac2)
:checkjavac2
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac2) else (goto checkjavac3)
:checkjavac3
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac3) else (goto checkjavac4)
:checkjavac4
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac4) else (goto checkjavac5)
:checkjavac5
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac5) else (goto checkjavac6)
:checkjavac6
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac6) else (goto checkjavac7)
:checkjavac7
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac7) else (goto checkjavac8)
:checkjavac8
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_01\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac8) else (goto checkjavac9)
:checkjavac9
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_02\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac9) else (goto checkjavac10)
:checkjavac10
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_03\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac10) else (goto checkjavac11)
:checkjavac11
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_04\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac11) else (goto checkjavac12)
:checkjavac12
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac12) else (goto javacerror)
:setjavac
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac2
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac3
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac4
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac5
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac6
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac7
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac8
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_01\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac9
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_02\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac10
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_03\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac11
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_04\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac12
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:javacerror
cls
title Error
echo You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok’s tutorial
echo on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for a direct link to download
echo the newest JDK Update.
pause
cls
goto menu
:checkjava
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava) else (goto checkjava2)
:checkjava2
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava2) else (goto checkjava3)
:checkjava3
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava3) else (goto checkjava4)
:checkjava4
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava4) else (goto checkjava5)
:checkjava5
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava5) else (goto checkjava6)
:checkjava6
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava6) else (goto checkjava7)
:checkjava7
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava7) else (goto checkjava8)
:checkjava8
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_01\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava8) else (goto checkjava9)
:checkjava9
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_02\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava9) else (goto checkjava10)
:checkjava10
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_03\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava10) else (goto checkjava11)
:checkjava11
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_04\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava11) else (goto checkjava12)
:checkjava12
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava12) else (goto javaerror)
:setjava
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava2
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava3
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava4
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava5
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava6
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava7
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava8
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_01\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava9
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_02\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava10
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_03\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava11
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_04\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava12
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:javaerror
cls
title Error
echo You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok’s tutorial
echo on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for a direct link to download
echo the newest JDK Update.
pause
cls
goto menu

Now u got that Compiler so u dont need to have Runserver.bat

Step 6 :

Now we are almost done u will need people on ure server to
Open up Your Hamachi
On the top of ure hamachi u will see some numbers
That numbers is your i-p adress

Thats what people need to get on a hamachi server
Now Search for this :

If u see it click on it , then click on create new network
Above add ure network name
Down add the pass

Now u are done =]

Credits : 90% me 10% Mod Taharok ( for the compile )

« Last Edit: March 22, 2007, 04:46:29 PM by Melissa T » Report to moderator Logged

breaking the bridge
Senior Member

Rep: 25
Offline

 *Guide*- Getting Latest Java, Getting Hamachi, And Making You And Others Admins.

« Reply #1 on: March 11, 2007, 10:58:09 AM »

     *Guide On How To Get The Latest Java, Hamachi, And Making You And Others Admins On Your Server*

This is a simple guide on how to make you and others admins on your server.

Notice: Each section is numbered so you can easily navigate the things you need

Table of Contents:
#1-Getting JDK 6.0 (Latest Java)
#2-Compiling and running your server
#3-Hamachi (If needed)
#4-Making you and others admins
#5-Finishing up

#1-Getting The Latest Version Of Java
If you are wondering, “Why do I need the latest version of Java?” Well, the answer is because you need a backup base to play MoparScape because the Java you are using now, if its not the latest, doesn’t compile with the older versions, so therfore, you need the latest.
The latest version can be found here: http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp You need to accept the liscense agreements and terms of service in order to succesfully download. Downloads can take from seconds to minutes. You need JDK 6.0 and you need the language you are related to (English,Spanish,Hungrian,Etc.).
Once you have the latest Java, you shouldn’t have to do anything. It will run in your system every time you have something running with java!

#2-Compiling and Running Your Server
Within where you saved your source or however you got your source, you will find 2 windows within the server source folder saying either compile,cimpile.bat, or anything compile named window. Second, you will find another window icon that has either runserver.bat,runserver, or anything runserver named. These two important windows are almost like the brain of the server, besides the client.java. Anyways, if you would like to run your server, double click on compile and wait for a confirmation of when your server is completley compiled. They usually say for example: Path could not be specified… Loading PimpScape Server on 0.0.0.34 or whatever. So, after compiling, do the same with the runserver icon by double clicking and waiting on your server to be confirmed. Important: Once you get the confirmation for COMPILING, close the window it brings up, once you do runserver, minimize it so it will keep your server running! If you would like to shut down your server, then close out of the window the runserver brings up.

#3-Hamachi (If you want)
Hamachi, if you want a Hamachi server, you will find a download at logmeinhamachi.com. It simply is another hooking-in to servers that sometimes allows as rumors say “less lag”. You can get it if you want. After downloading and accepting liscense agreements and TOS (Terms of Service), it will bring you an icon on your desktop which you will start up and it will bring you with a starter tutorial. Simply follow the tut and then click the power button on the lower left side of the Hamachi window. This powers up your connector with servers around the world! If you want to join a server, click the button that looks like a triangle on the lower right side of the Hamahci window and fill out the info needed.

#4 Making You And Others Admins
This part is very simple. Go to your server source folder and look into the character folder and search whosever member you wish to make an admin. Find their file, double click on it, and search to about the 5th line or so and you will discover a player rights label. If it is zero, then change it to 1 for moderator, 2 for admin, and 3 for server owner. You don’t have to have level 3, but it’s fine if you do. Here is what the label should look like surrounded by other info in the character info.

Code:
[ACCOUNT]
character-username = p hat boy
character-password = covered for personal information

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3253
character-posy = 3422
character-rights = 2
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = Covered for Personal info
character-lastlogin = 20070020
character-energy = 100
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 9013
Then, go to file at the window and click save then exit out. After that, you should update, or “Compile” your server to make the changes you just saved. Then, after compiling, run your server and you should be an admin.

#5-Finishing Up
After completing all of the above, you and your server should be good to go. You shouldn’t have any problems with anything. If you do have problems, visit my help sticky in the MoparScape Questions Section of these forums, and I’ll answer any problems you have there. Please notify me that when you ask your question, that it is related to this topic so I can get back with you as quickly as I can. I am glad to help anyone and I hope this topic has helped many and hope that your server becomes very successful within its time

-Written Completley By Breaking The Bridge-

This topic hasn’t been copied by anybody that I have or haven’t seen and was written by me, Breaking The Bridge. Any copying of MY topic will be reported to a moderator.

Thanks,
Breaking The Bridge

« Last Edit: March 11, 2007, 11:07:55 AM by breaking the bridge » Report to moderator Logged
